statements: UPDATE ArtConservation SET restoration_process = 'Cleaned and Repaired' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ArtConservation SET conservation_notes = 'Needs further assessment' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ArtConservation SET project_name = 'Project A', restoration_process = 'Restoration in progress' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ArtConservation SET conservation_notes = 'Conservation completed successfully', historical_context = 'Artwork from the 18th century' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE art_restoration_projects SET restoration_notes = 'Completed the fine detailing' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE restoration_steps SET step_date = '2022-10-15', step_description = 'Applied protective coating' WHERE project_id = 2 AND step_id = 5;
UPDATE art_restoration_projects SET restoration_notes = 'Restoration in progress' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE restoration_steps SET step_description = 'Cleaned and polished the artifact' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE restoration_processes SET process_description = 'Updated process description' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE conservation_notes SET note = 'New note added' WHERE note_id = 5;
UPDATE restoration_processes SET process_description = 'Cleaning and repair' WHERE process_id = 1
UPDATE conservation_notes SET note = 'Important update - project progress' WHERE note_id = 3
UPDATE restoration_projects SET project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE restoration_notes SET note_content = 'Added new note content' WHERE note_id = 2;
UPDATE restoration_projects SET project_name = 'Updated Project Name', end_date = '2022-12-31', project_description = 'New project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE restoration_notes SET note_date = '2022-10-15', note_content = 'Added new note content' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE RestorationProcesses SET process_description = 'Updated description' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE Projects SET project_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE RestorationProcesses SET process_description='Updated process description', process_date='2022-09-30' WHERE process_id=1
UPDATE ArtPieces SET artist_name='New Artist', art_description='Revised art description' WHERE project_id=3
